content:
Podle mě Thunderbird přeposílá zprávy podle toho, který účet je nastavený jaké výchozí. Doporučuji zkusit nějaký doplněk, např. Identity Chooser, který by měl při přeposílání nabízet volbu "odesílacího" účtu.

Nevím, jestli to funguje i na Linuxu.
creator: poljos-moz

content:
That may well indicate your system is working correctly for the first time.

By default Thunderbird makers copies of sent mail and places it in the sent mail folder. Google and the various Microsoft properties (hotmail, MSN,live, outlook etc) also make copies of outgoing mail as it goes through their servers. For those providers duplicates are normal unless you disable the copies Thunderbird makes in account settings as neither provider offers an option to opt out of their copy.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
Prova a fare queste operazioni di manutenzione dell'archivio:

  1. Fare un backup integrale del profilo -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo
  2. Compattare le cartelle -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/compattazione-cartelle
  3. Riavviare Thunderbird
  4. Se il problema non è risolto, ricostruire l'indice globale -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/ricostruzione-indice-globale
  5. Riavviare Thunderbird
  6. Se il problema non si è ancora risolto: click destro sulla cartella che contiene la mail illeggibile -> Proprietà -> [Ripara la cartella]
creator: @next

Případně zkus zkontrolovat ve Správci hesel v Thunderbirdu, jestli jsou přihlašovací údaje správné. Můžeš taky heslo smazat a po novém pokusu o přihlášení zadat nové (nebo znovu totéž).

Správce hesel – zapamatování, mazání či změna hesel v Thunderbirdu

content: Il tipo di account lo dovresti poter verificare in Tasto menu > Impostazioni account > NOME_ACCOUNT > Impostazioni server Nelle prime righe dovrebbe dirti se è POP3 o IMAP
creator: @next

content: L'ho trovato e c'è scritto Server posta IMAP
creator: PAGHE1

content:
Con IMAP lo stato della casella di posta viene sincronizzato tra tutti i client collegati alla stessa cartella. Per cui se consulti la casella tramite un APP o tramite la webmail, qualsiasi cosa fai viene automaticamente replicata sul server e poi su Thunderbird la prima volte che si ricollega.

Questa è normalmente la causa più comune dei problemi che hai scritto.
creator: @next

content: Het zou kunnen dat een firewall of virusscanner bepaalde inhoud tegenhoudt, hebt u het al eens geprobeerd met deze twee verdedigingslinies uitgeschakeld? Is natuurlijk niet wenselijk om ze helemaal uit te schakelen, maar als hier het probleem blijkt te zitten, kunt u kijken of u een uitzondering voor Thunderbird kunt toevoegen.
creator: markh2

content: Your description gives me the impression that Thunderbird is being prevented from updating files. They often 'appear' as changed, but when thunderbird closes, the files aren't updated. When that happens, the file is saved with extension, such as inbox-1, inbox-2. You might also check to see if the prefs.js is suffering as well, possibly showing multiple copies. You might try pausing your antivirus to see if that affects the issue. I am not an expert at all on issues such as this, but what you describe are the symptoms.
creator: davidsk

content: As I wrote in my original message I have put the Thunderbird profile in the excluded section of my antivirus software. I also tried turning off the antivirus live scanning for a short time to see what difference it made. None.

content:
Dat kan, stel op beide computers uw account in als IMAP en dan wordt uw e-mail op beide computers gesynchroniseerd. Let wel op: de berichten blijven in de basis op de server staan, dus als u op één van de computers het bericht verwijdert, verdwijnt het ook op de andere.

Succes, we horen graag of het is gelukt!
creator: markh2

content: Ja, tenzij u op de broncomputer Thunderbird of uw profiel verwijdert. Ik neem aan dat u de gids voor het overzetten volgt, maar voor de volledigheid vindt u die hier.

content: First, please just post once with an issue and stay with the thread. Thank you. Second, the correct server is smtp.office365.com, port 587, STARTTLS and Oauth2 - I think with that change you'll be okay. The incoming server should be outlook.office35.com. That change was announced by MS a couple of months ago and was not initiated by Thunderbird.
creator: davidsk
